title: DUP: Extra cash for Casement on ‘fair basis’ with other sports

title: Why a parliamentary candidate can’t be removed by a party in the weeks up to an election
description: The withdrawal notice must be signed by the candidate, attested by a witness and delivered by 4pm on the 19th working day before the poll.
